references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper extends the understanding of diffusion models by reformulating them within the framework of stochastic differential equations, which are crucial for the method described in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents Stable Diffusion, a large-scale pre-trained diffusion model utilized as a powerful prior in this study's image super-resolution approach.

references.paper_title: Real-ESRGAN: Training real-world blind super-resolution with pure synthetic data
references.reason: This paper introduces the Real-ESRGAN model, a state-of-the-art method for real-world image super-resolution, which is used for comparison and evaluation purposes in the research.
